name: A Platform for Heavenly Children
description:
The Platform for Heavenly Children is a dense HexCrawl that can fit into other dark fantasy games, especially that one!

Enter a realm caught between two demons who have taken the face of the Sun and the Moon. Their forces destroying everything in their visage. Who is left? What can be done to stop them...or encourage them?

There are lots of tools within including streamlined HexCrawl procedures, intense weather, multiple locations per Hex, Factions, NPCs, creatures, magic items, and lots of freedom to go about interacting into this area on player terms.

This is an ashcan, in-development adventure with the following items being worked on:

- Art and Layout will be added when able

- Clarity and continuity across formatting

- Continued editing of lore, locations, items, and mobs 

- Additional tools for Referees 

- Additional changes based on cool feedback
